paragraph: Bernard Oulion (French pronunciation: ​[bɛʁnaʁ uljɔ̃]; born 7 October 1946 in Saint-Étienne), known professionally as Bernard Lavilliers ([bɛʁnaʁ lavilje]), is a French singer-songwriter and actor.
Tout est permis, rien n'est possible (1984)
Gentilshommes de fortune — Rêves et voyages (1987)
